title: Academic Integrity Prevention and Moral Reflection Education for Science Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Knowledge and Understanding of Vocational Training Institutions
context.additional_context: Developmental Approach Education for Science Job Seekers in Online Environments, Emphasizing Moral Implications and Prevention Strategies for Academic Dishonesty

learning_goals: Learners can analyze academic misconduct cases to identify at least three moral dilemma situations
Learners can establish misconduct prevention strategies using ethical decision-making frameworks from scientific workplace contexts
Learners can reassess their moral values through reflective writing and compose academic integrity pledges
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
